vendor_name: La Bobadilla, a Royal Hideaway Hotel
title: Award-Winning Andalusian Heritage Retreat with Michelin-Starred Restaurant, Daily Breakfast & Spa Access
description:
Exclusive dining, expansive wellness facilities and decadent heritage features are the order of the day at this five-star member of The Leading Hotels of the World. This Andalusian-village-inspired hotel has pioneered slow travel, encouraging you to stay a while with a fully equipped hydrotherapy spa and two sprawling pools dotted among olive groves.

The serene location between Granada and Costa del Sol is the backdrop of four sun-drenched restaurants and two bars, including Michelin-starred La Finca, serving Andalusian delicacies like caviar from neighbouring Riofrio, or El Cortijo Restaurant, boasting a charming terrace overlooking olive trees and distant vineyards. The romance of marble and Mudejar architecture makes this hideaway one of Spain's most coveted destinations.
location_description: La Bobadilla, a Royal Hideaway Hotel
offer_address: Finca La Bobadilla Carretera Salinas, A-333, Km. 65, 5, 18300 Loja, Granada, Spain

title: Award-Winning Hacienda Romance near Granada with Onsite Swimming Pool, Tennis Court & Daily Breakfast
description: Experience a glamorous and authentic hacienda stay at La Esperanza Granada, nestled in the hills of orange groves, just a 90-minute drive from Malaga. Discover the beauty of Granada, including the world-famous Alhambra Palace, or spend your day at the sprawling property, set within 12 acres of private flower-filled gardens, and fruit and almond trees. Immerse yourself in the Andalusian-inspired design, woven throughout the carefully curated antiques and fine art evident in every suite and shared space, and indulge in the villa's exceptional facilities, including a tennis court, sparkling pool, a well-stocked library and a serene spa treatment room.

title: Boutique Spanish Villa 90 minutes from Malaga with Daily Breakfast & Nightly Cocktails
description:
Be drawn into a new realm of relaxation with a glamorous, boutique stay at the award-winning La Esperanza Granada, overlooking the rolling hills of Lecrin Valley in the Andalusia region approximately 90-minutes from Malaga. Get acquainted with the many marvels of Granada, including a visit to the ancient Islamic palace of Alhambra, around a 35-minute drive away, or stay within the sprawling property to fully absorb its superb beauty - the villa is set on 12 acres of private flower-filled gardens, groves of fruit trees, almond trees and forests.

The Andalusia-inspired design has been seamlessly woven throughout the shared spaces, suites and rooms, and the exceptional facilities won’t go unnoticed. Make use of the tennis court, shimmering pool, library or spa treatment room for ultimate relaxation.

vendor_name: Hotel Hospes Palacio de Los Patos
title: Granada 19th-Century Palace Glamour with Fine-Dining Restaurant
description: Get lost among the charming streets of Old Town Granada when you stay at Palacio de los Patos, a five-star renovated 19th-century palace with a contemporary glow-up. When not dipping into the city's fascinating history on daily expeditions, take a deep dive into culinary wonders at Los Patos Restaurant with tantalising local delicacies on the menu. Meanwhile, Spa Bodyna offers revitalising spa treatments as well as a relaxing whirlpool, Turkish baths and a dry sauna.
offer_address: C. Solarillo de Gracia, 1, 18002 Granada, Spain

title: Glamorous Boutique Spanish Villa Overlooking Lecrin Valley
description:
Be drawn into a new realm of relaxation with a glamorous, boutique stay at La Esperanza Granada overlooking the rolling hills of Lecrin Valley in the Andalusia region. Get acquainted with the many marvels of Granada, including a visit to the ancient Islamic palace of Alhambra, around a 35-minute drive away, or stay within the sprawling property set on 12 acres of private flower-filled gardens, groves of fruit trees, almond trees and forests to fully absorb its superb beauty. 

The Andalusia-inspired design has been seamlessly woven throughout the shared spaces, suites and rooms, and the exceptional facilities won’t go unnoticed. Make use of the tennis court, shimmering pool, library, or spa treatment room for moments of relaxation.

title: Art Deco Spanish Luxury in the Heart of Granada with Rooftop Cocktail Bar
description: Located in the heart of Granada - a dreamy Spanish haven, showcasing the epitome of Mediterranean wonder - you will discover the Seda Club Hotel, designed for the lover of Art Deco splendour and modern luxuries. This retreat boasts pure style with a rooftop cocktail bar overlooking the cathedral. Spend hours wandering the cobblestoned streets, stopping only to indulge in some authentic tapas and to admire the culture, before returning to treat yourself to an afternoon in the spa.
offer_address: Plaza de la Trinidad, C. Buensuceso, 2, 18001 Granada, Spain
